Package itec3030.assignments.a2

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AbstractNewTempSensorAdapter  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FurnaceDecorator
    Uses the decorator pattern Counts as a subclass for OurFurnace.
    Humidifier
    This is a decoration class that is attached to the FurnaceDecorator.
    Main  
    NewTempSensorAdapter
    This is an adapter for the NewTempSensorDriver that is complied with the observer pattern that NewTemp imposes.
    OldTempSensorAdapter
    Uses adapter pattern Adapter pattern is about trying to communicate between two incompatible programs The adapter is created so when both programs have a hard time complying with each other can communicate with the each other.
    OurFurnace
    A new family of furnaces made by Smart Builders Smart Builders - developers who build custom smart homes by putting Various components together
    PlainGasF1
    This is a type of furnace that is attached to Ourfurnace and it extends it A furnace model made by Smart Builder developers
    WiFi
    A decoration class that is attached to the FurnaceDecorator
